scripts/cortex_cli.py.summary:
{
  "purpose": "CLI Orchestrator for the Mnemonic Cortex RAG server and Protocol 128 (Learning Loop). Serves as the Single Source of Truth for Terminal Operations involving knowledge ingestion, retrieval, snapshotting, and soul persistence.",
  "layer": "Orchestrator",
  "supported_object_types": ["CLI Command", "RAG", "Snapshot"],
  "usage": [
    "python scripts/cortex_cli.py ingest --incremental --hours 24",
    "python scripts/cortex_cli.py query \"Protocol 128\"",
    "python scripts/cortex_cli.py snapshot --type seal --manifest .agent/learning/learning_manifest.json",
    "python scripts/cortex_cli.py guardian --mode TELEMETRY"
  ],
  "args": [
    "ingest: Perform RAG ingestion (Full or Incremental)",
    "query: Perform semantic search",
    "snapshot: Capture Protocol 128 snapshot",
    "guardian: Generate Guardian Boot Digest",
    "persist-soul: Broadcast snapshot to Hugging Face",
    "debrief: Run learning debrief logic",
    "stats: View RAG health statistics"
  ],
  "inputs": [
    ".agent/learning/learning_manifest.json",
    ".agent/learning/guardian_manifest.json",
    "Project files (md, py, js, etc.) for ingestion"
  ],
  "outputs": [
    "RAG Database (.vector_data/)",
    "Snapshots (.agent/learning/snapshots/)",
    "Guardian Digest (stdout/file)"
  ],
  "dependencies": [
    "mcp_servers/rag_cortex/operations.py",
    "mcp_servers/learning/operations.py",
    "mcp_servers/evolution/operations.py"
  ],
  "key_functions": [
    "main()",
    "verify_iron_core()",
    "ingest()",
    "snapshot()"
  ],
  "consumed_by": [
    "User (Manual CLI)",
    "Agent (via Tool Calls)",
    "CI/CD Pipelines"
  ]
}

scripts/domain_cli.py.summary:
{
  "purpose": "CLI Orchestrator for Sanctuary Domain Logic (Chronicle, Task, ADR, Protocol). Replaces generic MCP servers with a direct Python CLI interface for CRUD operations and file management.",
  "layer": "Orchestrator",
  "supported_object_types": ["Chronicle", "Task", "ADR", "Protocol"],
  "usage": [
    "python scripts/domain_cli.py chronicle list --limit 15",
    "python scripts/domain_cli.py task create \"Fix Bug\" --objective \"Fix X\"",
    "python scripts/domain_cli.py adr get 85",
    "python scripts/domain_cli.py protocol search \"Mnemonic\""
  ],
  "args": [
    "chronicle: Manage Chronicle Entries",
    "task: Manage Tasks",
    "adr: Manage Architecture Decision Records",
    "protocol: Manage Protocols"
  ],
  "inputs": [
    "00_CHRONICLE/ENTRIES/",
    "tasks/",
    "ADRs/",
    "01_PROTOCOLS/"
  ],
  "outputs": [
    "Markdown files in respective directories"
  ],
  "dependencies": [
    "mcp_servers/chronicle/operations.py",
    "mcp_servers/task/operations.py",
    "mcp_servers/adr/operations.py",
    "mcp_servers/protocol/operations.py"
  ],
  "key_functions": [
    "ChronicleOperations.create_entry()",
    "TaskOperations.create_task()",
    "ADROperations.create_adr()",
    "ProtocolOperations.create_protocol()"
  ],
  "consumed_by": [
    "User (Manual CLI)",
    "Agent (via Tool Calls)"
  ]
}

scripts/link-checker/verify_links.py.summary:
{
  "purpose": "Comprehensive integrity checker for the Project Sanctuary knowledge graph. Scans Markdown files and JSON manifests for broken internal links (dead references). Optionally validates external URLs. Enforces Protocol 128: Source Verification (Rule 9).",
  "layer": "Curate / Link Checker",
  "supported_object_types": ["Markdown", "Manifest"],
  "usage": [
    "python scripts/link-checker/verify_links.py",
    "python scripts/link-checker/verify_links.py --check-external --output report.json"
  ],
  "args": [
    "--root: Project root directory (default: .)",
    "--check-external: Enable HTTP/HTTPS validation (slower)",
    "--output: JSON report path"
  ],
  "inputs": [
    "**/*.md",
    "**/*manifest.json"
  ],
  "outputs": [
    "JSON Report of broken links",
    "Console summary"
  ],
  "dependencies": [
    "requests (external lib)"
  ],
  "key_functions": [
    "scan_md_file()",
    "resolve_relative_path()"
  ],
  "consumed_by": [
    "CI/CD Pipelines",
    "Agent (Pre-Flight checks)"
  ]
}

tools/cli.py.summary:
{
  "purpose": "Main entry point for the Antigravity Command System. Orchestrates sub-tools for context bundling, tool discovery, workflow management, and queries.",
  "layer": "Tools / CLI",
  "supported_object_types": ["Generic", "Workflow"],
  "usage": [
    "python tools/cli.py --help",
    "python tools/cli.py tools list",
    "python tools/cli.py query \"search term\"",
    "python tools/cli.py workflow start --name codify --target MyTarget"
  ],
  "args": [
    "--target: Target ID",
    "--type: Artifact Type",
    "--json: Output in JSON format",
    "--manifest: Custom manifest path",
    "--output: Output directory"
  ],
  "inputs": [
    "(See individual sub-tools)"
  ],
  "outputs": [
    "(See individual sub-tools)"
  ],
  "dependencies": [
    "tools/investigate/utils/path_resolver.py",
    "tools/orchestrator/workflow_manager.py"
  ],
  "key_functions": [
    "resolve_type_from_inventory()",
    "main()"
  ]
}

tools/codify/diagrams/export_mmd_to_imag.summary:
{
  "purpose": "Renders all .mmd files in docs/architecture_diagrams/ to PNG images. Run this script whenever diagrams are updated to regenerate images.",
  "layer": "Application Layer",
  "supported_object_types": ["Mermaid Diagram (.mmd)"],
  "usage": [
    "python3 scripts/export_mmd_to_image.py                 # Render all",
    "python3 scripts/export_mmd_to_image.py my_diagram.mmd  # Render specific file(s)",
    "python3 scripts/export_mmd_to_image.py --svg           # Render as SVG instead",
    "python3 scripts/export_mmd_to_image.py --check         # Check for outdated images"
  ],
  "args": [
    {
      "name": "--input",
      "type": "str",
      "help": "Input MMD file or directory",
      "required": false
    },
    {
      "name": "--output",
      "type": "str",
      "help": "Output file path or directory",
      "required": false
    },
    {
      "name": "--svg",
      "action": "store_true",
      "help": "Render as SVG instead of PNG"
    },
    {
      "name": "--check",
      "action": "store_true",
      "help": "Check for outdated images only"
    }
  ],
  "inputs": ["docs/architecture_diagrams/*.mmd"],
  "outputs": ["PNG or SVG images in the specified output directory"],
  "dependencies": ["mermaid-cli (npm install -g @mermaid-js/mermaid-cli)"],
  "consumed_by": [],
  "key_functions": [
    "check_mmdc()",
    "render_diagram(mmd_path: Path, output_format: str = \"png\") -> bool",
    "check_outdated(mmd_path: Path, output_format: str = \"png\") -> bool"
  ]
}

tools/codify/rlm/debug_rlm.py.summary:
{
  "purpose": "Debug utility to inspect the RLMConfiguration state. Verifies path resolution, manifest loading, and environment variable overrides. Useful for troubleshooting cache path conflicts.",

  "supported_object_types": ["RLM Configuration"],

  "args": [],

tools/codify/rlm/distiller.py.summary:
{
  "purpose": "Recursive summarization of repo content using Ollama.",
  "layer": "Curate / Rlm",
  "supported_object_types": ["Generic"],
  "usage": [
    "# 1. Distill a single file (Tool Logic)",
    "python tools/codify/rlm/distiller.py --file tools/codify/rlm/rlm_config.py --type tool",
    "python tools/codify/rlm/distiller.py --file tools/investigate/miners/db_miner.py --type tool --force",
    "# 2. Distill legacy system documentation (Default)",
    "python tools/codify/rlm/distiller.py --file filepath.md",
    "# 3. Incremental update (files changed in last 24 hours)",
    "python tools/codify/rlm/distiller.py --since 24 --type legacy",
    "# 4. Process specific directory",
    "python tools/codify/rlm/distiller.py --target folder --type sanctuary",
    "# 5. Force update (regenerate summaries even if unchanged)",
    "python tools/codify/rlm/distiller.py --target tools/investigate/miners --type tool --force"
  ],
  "args": [
    "--file",
    "Single file to process",
    "--model",
    "Ollama model to use",
    "--cleanup",
    "Remove stale entries for deleted/renamed files",
    "--since",
    "Process only files changed in last N hours",
    "--no-cleanup",
    "Skip auto-cleanup on incremental distills",
    "--target",
    "Target directories to process  (use with caution currently will process all files in the target directory)",
    "--force",
    "Force update (regenerate summaries even if unchanged)"
  ],
  "inputs": ["(See code)"],
  "outputs": ["(See code)"],
  "dependencies": [
    "tools/codify/rlm/rlm_config.py (Configuration)",
    "tools/curate/inventories/manage_tool_inventory.py (Cyclical: Updates inventory descriptions)",
    "tools/curate/rlm/cleanup_cache.py (Orphan Removal)"
  ],
  "consumed_by": [
    "tools/curate/inventories/manage_tool_inventory.py (Invokes distiller on tool updates)"
  ],
  "key_functions": [
    "load_manifest()",
    "load_cache()",
    "save_cache()",
    "compute_hash()",
    "call_ollama()",
    "distill()",
    "run_cleanup()"
  ]
}

tools/curate/documentation/workflow_inve.summary:
{
  "purpose": "Manages the workflow inventory for agent workflows (.agent/workflows/*.md). Provides search, scan, add, and update capabilities. Outputs are docs/antigravity/workflow/workflow_inventory.json and docs/antigravity/workflow/WORKFLOW_INVENTORY.md.",
  "layer": "Application Layer",
  "supported_object_types": ["Workflows"],
  "usage": [
    "# Scan and regenerate inventory\npython tools/curate/documentation/workflow_inventory_manager.py --scan",
    "# Search workflows\npython tools/curate/documentation/workflow_inventory_manager.py --search \"keyword\"",
    "# List all workflows\npython tools/curate/documentation/workflow_inventory_manager.py --list",
    "# Show workflow details\npython tools/curate/documentation/workflow_inventory_manager.py --show \"workflow-name\""
  ],
  "args": [
    {
      "long": "--scan",
      "short": "",
      "action": "store_true",
      "help": "Scan workflows dir and regenerate inventory"
    },
    {
      "long": "--search",
      "short": "",
      "type": "str",
      "metavar": "QUERY",
      "help": "Search workflows by keyword"
    },
    {
      "long": "--list",
      "short": "",
      "action": "store_true",
      "help": "List all workflows"
    },
    {
      "long": "--show",
      "short": "",
      "type": "str",
      "metavar": "NAME",
      "help": "Show details for a workflow"
    }
  ],
  "inputs": [".agent/workflows/*.md"],
  "outputs": [
    "docs/antigravity/workflow/workflow_inventory.json",
    "docs/antigravity/workflow/WORKFLOW_INVENTORY.md"
  ],
  "dependencies": ["PathResolver"],
  "consumed_by": [],
  "key_functions": [
    "parse_frontmatter",
    "extract_called_by",
    "scan_workflows",
    "load_inventory",
    "save_inventory",
    "generate_json",
    "generate_markdown",
    "search_workflows",
    "list_workflows",
    "show_workflow"
  ]
}

tools/curate/inventories/manage_tool_inv.summary:
{
  "purpose": "Comprehensive manager for Tool Inventories. Supports list, add, update, remove, search, audit, and generate operations.",
  "layer": "Curate / Curate",
  "supported_object_types": ["Generic"],
  "usage": [
    "python tools/curate/inventories/manage_tool_inventory.py --help",
    "python tools/curate/inventories/manage_tool_inventory.py list",
    "python tools/curate/inventories/manage_tool_inventory.py search \"keyword\"",
    "python tools/curate/inventories/manage_tool_inventory.py remove --path \"path/to/tool.py\"",
    "python tools/curate/inventories/manage_tool_inventory.py update --path \"tool.py\" --desc \"New description\"",
    "python tools/curate/inventories/manage_tool_inventory.py discover --auto-stub"
  ],
  "args": [
    "--inventory",
    "--path",
    "--category",
    "--desc",
    "--output",
    "keyword",
    "--status",
    "--new-path",
    "--mark-compliant",
    "--include-json",
    "--json",
    "--batch",
    "--dry-run"
  ],
  "inputs": ["(See code)"],
  "outputs": ["(See code)"],
  "dependencies": [
    "tools/codify/rlm/distiller.py (Cyclical: Triggers distillation on update)",
    "tools/curate/rlm/cleanup_cache.py (Atomic cleanup on removal)"
  ],
  "consumed_by": ["tools/codify/rlm/distiller.py (Invokes update_tool for RLM-driven enrichment)"],
  "key_functions": [
    "generate_markdown()",
    "extract_docstring()",
    "main()"
  ]
  }

tools/curate/inventories/vibe_cleanup.py.summary:
{
  "purpose": "Inventory Reconciliation Utility. Scans the `tool_inventory.json` against the filesystem and automatically removes entries for files that no longer exist (Pruning). Also lists all current scripts to audit 'ghosts' vs reality.",
  "layer": "Curate / Inventories",
  "supported_object_types": ["Temp Files"],
  "usage": ["python tools/curate/inventories/vibe_cleanup.py"],
  "args": [
    "None"
  ],
  "inputs": [
    "tools/tool_inventory.json",
    "Filesystem (tools/ directory)"
  ],
  "outputs": [
    "Updates to tool_inventory.json",
    "Console log of removed files"
  ],
  "dependencies": [
    "tools/curate/inventories/manage_tool_inventory.py"
  ],
  "key_functions": [
    "get_missing_files()",
    "remove_tool()"
  ],
  "consumed_by": [
    "CI/CD Pipelines",
    "Manual maintenance"
  ]
}

tools/investigate/utils/next_number.py.summary:
{
  "purpose": "Sequential Identifier Generator. Scans artifact directories (Specs, Tasks, ADRs, Chronicles) to find the next available sequence number. Prevents ID collisions.",
  "layer": "Investigate / Utils",
  "supported_object_types": ["ADR", "Task", "Spec", "Chronicle"],
  "usage": [
    "python tools/investigate/utils/next_number.py --type spec",
    "python tools/investigate/utils/next_number.py --type task",
    "python tools/investigate/utils/next_number.py --type all"
  ],
  "args": [
    "--type: Artifact type (spec, task, adr, chronicle, all)"
  ],
  "inputs": [
    "specs/",
    "tasks/",
    "ADRs/",
    "00_CHRONICLE/ENTRIES/"
  ],
  "outputs": [
    "Next available ID (e.g. \"0045\") to stdout"
  ],
  "dependencies": [
    "pathlib",
    "re"
  ],
  "key_functions": [
    "main()"
  ],
  "consumed_by": [
    "scripts/domain_cli.py",
    "Manual workflow execution"
  ]
}

tools/orchestrator/proof_check.py.summary:
{
  "purpose": "Scans spec.md, plan.md, and tasks.md for file references and verifies each referenced file has been modified compared to origin/main. This tool prevents 'checkbox fraud'.",
  "layer": "Orchestrator / Verification",
  "supported_object_types": ["Spec artifacts", "File references"],
  "usage": [
    "python tools/orchestrator/proof_check.py --spec-dir specs/0005-human-gate-protocols",
    "python tools/orchestrator/proof_check.py --spec-dir specs/0005-foo --json"
  ],
  "args": [
    "--spec-dir: Path to spec directory (required)",
    "--project-root: Project root directory (default: current)",
    "--json: Output in JSON format (optional)"
  ],
  "inputs": [
    "specs/[ID]/spec.md",
    "specs/[ID]/plan.md",
    "specs/[ID]/tasks.md"
  ],
  "outputs": [
    "Summary report of modified/unchanged files",
    "Exit code 1 if fail, 0 if pass"
  ],
  "dependencies": [
    "Git"
  ],
  "key_functions": [
    "extract_file_refs()",
    "check_file_modified()",
    "run_proof_check()"
  ],
  "consumed_by": [
    "tools/cli.py workflow retrospective",
    "/workflow-retrospective workflow"
  ]
}

tools/orchestrator/workflow_manager.py.summary:
{
  "purpose": "Core logic for the 'Python Orchestrator' architecture (ADR-0030 v2/v3). Handles Git State checks, Context Alignment, Branch Creation & Naming, and Context Manifest Initialization. Acts as the single source of truth for 'Start Workflow' logic.",
  "layer": "Orchestrator",
  "supported_object_types": ["Workflow State"],
  "usage": [
    "from tools.orchestrator.workflow_manager import WorkflowManager",
    "mgr = WorkflowManager()",
    "mgr.start_workflow('codify', 'MyTarget')"
  ],
  "args": [
    "Workflow Name",
    "Target ID",
    "Artifact Type"
  ],
  "inputs": [
    "Workflow Name",
    "Target ID"
  ],
  "outputs": [
    "Exit Code 0: Success (Proceed)",
    "Exit Code 1: Failure (Stop)"
  ],
  "dependencies": [
    "tools/investigate/utils/path_resolver.py"
  ],
  "key_functions": [
    "start_workflow",
    "get_git_status",
    "get_current_branch",
    "generate_next_id"
  ],
  "consumed_by": [
    "tools/cli.py",
    "Manual Scripts"
  ]
}

tools/retrieve/bundler/manifest_manager..summary:
{
  "purpose": "Handles initialization and modification of the context-manager manifest. Acts as the primary CLI for the Context Bundler. Supports strict type validation via get_base_manifest_path(strict=True).",
  "layer": "Curate / Bundler",
  "supported_object_types": ["Manifest", "Generic"],
  "usage": [
    "python tools/retrieve/bundler/manifest_manager.py init --type learning --bundle-title 'My Bundle'",
    "python tools/retrieve/bundler/manifest_manager.py add --path 'file.md' --note 'Description'",
    "python tools/retrieve/bundler/manifest_manager.py bundle -o output.md"
  ],
  "args": [
    "--manifest: Custom manifest path",
    "--base: Base manifest type",
    "--bundle-title: Title for new bundle",
    "--type: Artifact type (generic, learning, guardian, etc.)",
    "--path: File path to add/remove",
    "--note: Description for file entry",
    "--output: Output bundle path"
  ],
  "inputs": ["base-manifests-index.json", "base-manifests/*.json"],
  "outputs": ["file-manifest.json", "Context bundles (.md)"],
  "dependencies": ["tools/retrieve/bundler/bundle.py", "tools/investigate/utils/path_resolver.py"],
  "consumed_by": ["tools/cli.py", "/workflow-bundle"],
  "key_functions": [
    "add_file()",
    "bundle()",
    "get_base_manifest_path()",
    "init_manifest()",
    "list_manifest()",
    "load_manifest()",
    "remove_file()",
    "save_manifest()",
    "search_files()",
    "update_file()"
  ]
}

tools/retrieve/bundler/validate.py.summary:
{
  "purpose": "Validates context bundler manifest files against the schema. Checks for required fields (title, files), path format, path traversal attacks, and legacy format warnings. Part of Red Team P0 fixes.",
  "layer": "Retrieve / Bundler",
  "supported_object_types": ["Manifest", "Index"],
  "usage": [
    "python tools/retrieve/bundler/validate.py manifest.json",
    "python tools/retrieve/bundler/validate.py --all-base",
    "python tools/retrieve/bundler/validate.py --check-index",
    "python tools/retrieve/bundler/validate.py --quiet manifest.json"
  ],
  "args": [
    "manifest: Path to manifest JSON file",
    "--all-base: Validate all base manifests in base-manifests/",
    "--check-index: Validate base-manifests-index.json integrity",
    "--quiet: Suppress output, exit code only (for CI/CD)"
  ],
  "inputs": [
    "Manifest JSON files",
    "tools/standalone/context-bundler/base-manifests-index.json",
    "tools/standalone/context-bundler/base-manifests/*.json"
  ],
  "outputs": [
    "Validation report to stdout",
    "Exit code 0 (valid) or 1 (invalid)"
  ],
  "dependencies": ["tools/standalone/context-bundler/file-manifest-schema.json"],
  "consumed_by": [
    "/workflow-bundle",
    "CI/CD pipelines",
    "tools/cli.py"
  ],
  "key_functions": [
    "validate_manifest()",
    "validate_index()",
    "validate_all_base()",
    "main()"
  ]
}

summary.purpose: Standardizes cross-platform path resolution and provides access to the Master Object Collection (MOC). Acts as a central utility for file finding.
Node.js implementation of path resolution logic.
Resolves RLM configuration paths for Node.js tools.
